short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove website styling that may be disturbing to people with autism.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
People living with autism may find certain web styles and fonts to be disturbing. This extension tries to remove these to make the web more accessible.
If you visit our website, you will find a document highlighting how exactly this extension is useful for poeple with ASD.

Homepage: https://github.com/MBS9/extension
